attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to scrap the pay scale of all politicians, and introduce a sliding scale where politicians would have their wage decided on by a committee made up of their constituents’ and dependant on their personal performance and the level of attention they pay to the very people who vote them into power, thus removing the celebrity status of politicians who are meant to serve us and act upon our wishes not their own personal agenda’s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to scrap the pay scale of all politicians, and introduce a sliding scale where politicians would have their wage decided on by a committee made up of their constituents’ and dependant on their personal performance and the level of attention they pay to the very people who vote them into power, thus removing the celebrity status of politicians who are meant to serve us and act upon our wishes not their own personal agenda’s.
